datafield.subfield: Residence for Mrs. Mary M. Kew at San Diego, California
76.3 x 129.3 cm. (30 1/8 x 51 in.) or smaller.
This record is Part 1 of 3 parts.
Bracketed title elements supplied by cataloger or taken from inventory.
Forms part of the Greene & Greene architectural drawings and photographs ; job no. 300. Dept. of Drawings & Archives, Avery Architectural and Fine Arts Library.

This set consists of 22 drawings, blueprints on paper; 18 drawings, blueprints with crayon markings on paper; 16 drawings, graphite on tracing paper; 5 drawings, graphite on paper; 4 drawings, ink on linen with graphite annotations, and also with ink wash applied to the verso; 4 drawings, pencil and ink on tracing paper; 3 drawings, ink with graphite on cloth; 1 drawing, blueprint with crayon and graphite on paper; 1 drawing, graphite and crayon on tracing paper; 1 drawing, blueprint with crayon and graphite and ink annotations on paper; 1 drawing, blueline print on paper; 1 drawing, graphite and watercolor wash on tracing paper; 1 drawing, graphite on graph paper; 1 drawing, graphite and ink with crayon on tracing paper; and 1 drawing, graphite and crayon on paper.
Gift of Jean Murray Bangs (Mrs. Harwell Hamilton Harris), 1960; formerly the collection of Charles Sumner Greene.
Mary M. Kew house (San Diego, Calif.)
Mary M. Kew house (San Diego, Calif.)
The Greene & Greene architectural drawings and photographs.

Foundation plan, plan of living rm. chimney, section thru terrace walls, detail of step foundations, section thru basement steps (steps and area wall of concrete), [detail of] step area wall, sections[through footings], plan of dining rm. chimney :
"Spec. -- all walls and footings of concrete, up to finished grade. All work showing above grade faced with stone. All steps of brick, except rear of cement".
"Exterior walls concrete up to finished grade, above grade of stone".

"Note -- chimney footings of concrete, 12" thick and to extend 4" larger all round than size of chimney. All posts in basement 4"x6" O[regon] p[ine] unless otherwise indicated. All girders 6"x6" O.P.".
B[lue] p[rint] record -- 1-7-13 3 sets, 1-20-13 part set, 1-23-13 2 sets".

First floor plan, plan and elevation of east terrace, detail of angle at "A", plan and elevation of terrace steps, plan of center chimney, plan of rear hall, plan of living rm chimney :
"Note -- screens on sash and doors where indicated by letter S".
"Note -- all doors in kitchen and rear part to be 6'-6" high and 1 3/8" thick. All doors in main rooms and rear hall to be 6'-10" high and 1 3/4" thick unless otherwise marked".

"Note -- screens on sash and doors where indicated by letter S".
"Note -- all doors on second floor unless otherwise marked to be 6'-6" high".
